long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the Chrome extension for Wigo.
Wigo, aka "What Is Going On" is a light pull/push server monitoring tool written in Golang.
It displays the monitoring staus on the extension icon and can play a sound when a monitored server goes down.
